attributes.action: Save Josh Cartwright From Moving To London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically our good friend Josh Cartwrights's mother wants to move to London. But none of his friends wants him to Leave King's Lynn for London. So everyone who has signed this petition wants him to stay put in King's Lynn.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
